state: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! First of all, you could, like, venture north. With that over with, try to move west. Once you get around to doing that, travel south. With that over with, venture south. And then, make an effort to travel west. Then, make an effort to take a trip north. With that over with, go to the north. Next, go west. Then, attempt to move west. With that over with, try to move south. Then, make an effort to travel south. With that done, go east. Then, go to the north. Then, lift the keycard from the floor of the cookery. That's it! -= Dish-Pit =- You find yourself in a dish-pit. A typical one. You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a fridge. The fridge is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever! If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a shelf. The shelf is typical. But the thing is empty. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an unguarded exit to the west. > -= Dish-Pit =-0/1
